title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 152-3.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 152-3.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of the Foster Youth College Success

Initiative is to provide funding, subject to an appropriation for such purpose, to support services to assist youth in foster care to apply for, enroll in, and
succeed in college. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
152-3.1

Adopted

New

York State Register October 7, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 40, eff. 10/7/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
